t:
The boy standing beside
me on the empty platform
asked why I had the number
22 tattooed on the back of
my hand.



When the train came, I pushed him onto the track as the 22 morphed into a 23.
c:
Would you like to know why I've the number 23 tattooed on the back of my hand?



#boy #train #platform #question #murder #supernatural #number #hand
